xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: The Company has filed the Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated ) for the quarter ended September 30, 2021 along with the notes and the Limited Review Report through Quick Results and outcome of the Board meeting held on October 22, 2021. Hence request you to kindly refer the notes filed through results with the exchange on October 22, 2021
